item.title: Need lots of help lol [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @amt amt
item.description:
@amt wrote:

I would like to know more about coding talking npcs(haven’t seen any tuts)
I tried coding a random gem stall(no luck) i tried asking for a random gem code(got code did not work)

public static int gems [] = { 1617, 1619, 1621, 1623, 1631};

    public static int randomgems()
    {
        return seeds[(int)(Math.random()*gems.length)];
    }

if(objectID == 2562 && playerLevel[17] >= 80){ //-----ppl will need 80 thieving before they can thief the stall.
addItem(Item.randomgems(), 1);;
}else {
sendMessage(“you gotta have 80 thieving before you can thief this stall”);

}
I tried that code nothing i got errors

client.java:13841: illegal start of expression

^

^

^

^

^

^

current coding of stall

}
if(objectID == 2562){
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 25k”, 80, 750*playerLevel[17], 1624, 1, 0x340);
}

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2009, 03:29:50 pm[/size][hr]Also i can’t get stupid global objects to go -.-

makeGlobalObject(2215, 3387, 2107, 0, 10);

I see nothing wrong with that code do u??
